import React, { useState } from 'react' import Note from '../Note/note' import { NOTES } from './data' import Modal from '../Modal/modal' import H1vertical from '../h1vertical' // NotesList component for rendering a list of notes const NotesList = () => { const [currentNotes, setCurentNotes] = useState(NOTES) const [isModal, setIsModal] = useState(false) const [newTitle, setNewTitle] = useState('') const [newDescription, setNewDescription] = useState('') const deleteNote = (id) => { setCurentNotes(currentNotes.filter((note) => note.id !== id)) } const addNote = () => { if (newTitle.trim() && newDescription.trim()) { setCurentNotes([ ...currentNotes, { id: Math.random(), title: newTitle, description: newDescription }, ]) setNewTitle('') setNewDescription('') setIsModal(false) } } return ( <>

{text}

NOTATKI

{currentNotes.map((currentNote) => ( deleteNote(currentNote.id)} /> ))}

e.preventDefault()} > setNewTitle(event.target.value)} // Update state on change placeholder="Enter note title" className="p-2 rounded hover:animate-pulse" /> setNewDescription(event.target.value)} // Update state on change placeholder="Enter note description" className="p-2 rounded hover:animate-pulse" />
) } export default NotesList
